title: Sports Video Tech Company Trace Raises $47 Million Series C Round, Valued At $190 Million - Forbes
content: Sports Video Tech Company Trace Raises $47 Million Series C Round, Valued At $190 Million  Forbes
description: Trace, a sports video technology company focused on making personalized highlights of youth athletes, has raised $46 million in a Series C round. The company is now valued at $190 million.
